programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. Catholic leaders turn to Harvard symbolist Robert Langdon, who must put his uneasy relationship with the church hierarchy aside in an effort to crack the code and save the men's lives Ron Howard - Director Tom Hanks - Robert Langdon Ewan McGregor - Camerlengo Patrick McKenna Ayelet Zurer - Vittoria Vetra Stellan Skarsgård - Commander Richter Pierfrancesco Favino - Inspector Ernesto Olivetti Nikolaj Lie Kaas - Mr Gray / Assassin Armin Mueller-Stahl - Cardinal Strauss Thure Lindhardt - Chartrand David Pasquesi - Claudio Vincenzi Cosimo Fusco - Father Simeon Tom Hanks - Robert Langdon Ewan McGregor - Camerlengo Patrick McKenna Ayelet Zurer - Vittoria Vetra Stellan Skarsgård - Commander Richter Pierfrancesco Favino - Inspector Ernesto Olivetti Nikolaj Lie Kaas - Mr Gray / Assassin Armin Mueller-Stahl - Cardinal Strauss Thure Lindhardt - Chartrand David Pasquesi - Claudio Vincenzi Cosimo Fusco - Father Simeon.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Mystery thriller starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo and Woody Harrelson. programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: A woman who has rarely been without a boyfriend moves to New York following a break-up with her latest beau. She makes a fun-loving new friend, who introduces her to the city's nightlife and teaches her to enjoy the advantages of being single. programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Comedy starring Eddie Murphy as both Sherman Klump - the amiable, portly science teacher - and Buddy Love - his sleek, sharp alter ego. programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Crime caper starring Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett and Anne Hathaway. After being released from prison on parole, con artist Debbie Ocean reunites with her old partner-in-crime, Lou Miller. They immediately set about co-ordinating an audacious new heist: stealing a $150 million necklace from the actress wearing it at New York's Met Gala. programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: Comedy written and directed by the Coen brothers, starring George Clooney, John Turturro and Tim Blake Nelson. Mississippi during the Depression: three convicts escape from a chain gang with the intention of recovering over a million dollars in buried loot. programme.title: Sin City
programme.desc: Adaptation of Frank Miller's hard-boiled comic book, starring Bruce Willis, Clive Owen and Mickey Rourke. In the ultra-violent metropolis of Basin City, cops, criminals and femmes fatales collide in love, lust or gory conflict. Honest cop Hartigan tries to protect a dancer from a sadistic killer, while ex-con Marv wants revenge for the murder of his sweetheart. programme.title: The Cinema List: Black British Actors
programme.desc: This Black History Month, join us as we take a look at the work of some exceptionally talented Black British actors, from Naomie Harris to Idris Elba and beyond.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Action, Musical, Romance, Arts And Culture ║ 1993 ║ PG
programme.desc: The heroic outlaw returns from the Crusades to discover the country is in the grip of evil Prince John and the Sheriff of Rottingham, so he unites a motley band of warriors to overthrow them. programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 1985 ║ PG
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy adventure starring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd. High-school student Marty McFly thinks his future is ahead of him, until the day he tries out Dr Emmett Brown's modified DeLorean car and travels back in time. Stranded in 1955, Marty meets his parents and unwittingly changes their destiny. programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba. programme.title: Arcadian
programme.sub-title: Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action horror starring Nicolas Cage. Following an apocalyptic event, single father Paul lives with his two teenage sons on an isolated homestead, forced to hide every night from the nocturnal monsters that stalk the outdoors. Though the trio has settled into a relatively stable routine, their lives are threatened when the creatures start working out how to get inside.. programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Drama, Crime/detective, History, Thriller ║ 2012 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action thriller based on a true story, starring Jessica Chastain. After the 9/11 terrorist attacks, the hunt for al-Qaeda leader Osama Bin Laden intensifies and pressure grows on CIA agent Maya and her colleagues to bring him to justice. But as the operation stretches over years and spans the world, factions within the security services resort to methods that are not strictly by the book, methods that present a moral challenge for Maya Kathryn Bigelow - Director Jessica Chastain - Maya Jason Clarke (2) - Dan Joel Edgerton - Patrick, squadron team leader Jennifer Ehle - Jessica Mark Strong - George Kyle Chandler - Joseph Bradley Edgar Ramirez - Larry James Gandolfini - CIA director Harold Perrineau - Jack Stephen Dillane - National security advisor John Barrowman - Jeremy Scott Adkins - John Mark Duplass - Steve Daniel Lapaine - Tim, station chief Chris Pratt - Justin Callan Mulvey - Saber Frank Grillo - Squadron commanding officer Jessica Chastain - Maya Jason Clarke (2) - Dan Joel Edgerton - Patrick, squadron team leader Jennifer Ehle - Jessica Mark Strong - George Kyle Chandler - Joseph Bradley Edgar Ramirez - Larry James Gandolfini - CIA director Harold Perrineau - Jack Stephen Dillane - National security advisor John Barrowman - Jeremy Scott Adkins - John Mark Duplass - Steve Daniel Lapaine - Tim, station chief Chris Pratt - Justin Callan Mulvey - Saber Frank Grillo - Squadron commanding officer.

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: Alice is a reclusive writer, resigned to a solitary life on the seaside cliffs of southern England while the Second World War rages across the Channel. programme.desc: Classic thriller starring James Stewart and Grace Kelly. programme.title: The Birds
programme.sub-title: Horror, Thriller, Drama, Mystery, Romance ║ 1963 ║ X
programme.desc: Classic horror starring Tippi Hedren and Rod Taylor. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Decades later, Winton's records of the mission reawaken painful memories of the youngsters he couldn't save - and set him on an unexpected path to laying his ghosts to rest James Hawes - Director Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". programme.title: Internal Affairs
programme.desc: Andy Garcia is the straight arrow investigator determined to jail corrupt cop Richard Gere. Crime thriller directed by Mike Figgis. (1990)(110 mins).

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: Enigmatic loner Alan Ladd fights to help ranchers survive against land-hungry cattlemen, including sadistic gunslinger Jack Palance. Seminal Western action. (1953)(114 mins).

programme.title: The Dam Busters
programme.desc: Classic WWII epic about an engineer's daring plan to use bouncing bombs and low-flying aircraft to destroy a series of German dams. Richard Todd and Michael Redgrave star. (1955)(124 mins).

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Romcom starring Eddie Murphy as a womanising marketing director who meets his match in new boss Robin Givens. Halle Berry co-stars. Contains strong language/sex. (1992)(111 mins).

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait (1978)
programme.desc: Comedy starring Warren Beatty as a famous sportsman who, after his untimely death, attempts to find a new body to host his spirit. With Julie Christie. (1978)(96 mins).

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Unscrupulous fighter Kirk Douglas boxes his way to the top, but mistreats everyone around him along the way. Acclaimed drama co-starring Marilyn Maxwell. (1949)(99 mins).

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: Jewish aristocrat Charlton Heston vows revenge when he is cast into slavery by treacherous Roman commander Stephen Boyd. Oscar-winning epic. Violent scenes. (1959)(202 mins).

programme.title: No Country For Old Men
programme.desc: After stealing $2million in drug money, Josh Brolin is hunted by ruthless psychotic Javier Bardem. Oscar-winning crime thriller. Strong bloody violence/strong language. (2007)(118 mins).

programme.title: Alfie (1966)
programme.desc: London lothario Michael Caine charms Shelley Winters, Eleanor Bron and Jane Asher in this swinging 60s drama nominated for five Oscars. Moderate violence/sex references. (1966)(108 mins).

programme.title: The Day Of The Jackal
programme.desc: When meticulous hitman Edward Fox is hired to kill the French president, detective Michael Lonsdale faces a race against time to track him down. Violent scenes. (1972)(137 mins).

programme.title: Robocop (1987)
programme.desc: In future Detroit, an injured cop is rebuilt as a powerful cyborg to cut out crime and take down the gang who killed him. Action. Contains violence and flashing images. (1987)(99 mins).

programme.desc: Celebrate Black History Month with a look back at some of our favourite black directors, exploring their greatest contributions to cinema.

programme.desc: Kevin Smith's cult classic follows a day in the life of two convenience store workers. Low-key comedy starring Jeff Anderson. (1994)(87 mins).

programme.desc: Musical send-up of WWI, satirising the path towards the trenches.

programme.desc: Ray Breslin, the world's top security agent agrees to take on one last job. Action film starring Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger. (2013)(111mins).

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A kung-fu policeman must protect a female witness from a Hong Kong drug lord for whom she used to work. Jackie Chan and Brigitte Lin star. (1985)(89 mins).

programme.title: The Big Boss (1971)
programme.desc: Sworn to a sacred oath, a man investigates his cousin's disappearance. Action starring Bruce Lee, in Cantonese with subtitles. (1971)(96 mins).

programme.title: Project A 2
programme.desc: Sergeant Dragon Ma returns to his hometown to take down corrupt police inspector Chun. Sequel starring Jackie Chan. (1987)(108 mins).

programme.title: The Cinema List: Bourne
programme.desc: Twenty years after The Bourne Identity first reached our screens, explore the brilliant characterisation, camerawork, car chases and more that make this franchise iconic.

programme.title: Pompeii (2014)
programme.desc: Kit Harington plays a gladiator battling to save his true love as Mount Vesuvius causes devastation in Pompeii. Action with Kiefer Sutherland. (2014)(100 mins).

programme.desc: Betrayed and left for dead, government operative Gina Carano hunts down the truth in order to stay alive. With Michael Fassbender. Contains violence and flashing images. (2011)(89 mins).

programme.desc: Sworn to a sacred oath, a man investigates his cousin's disappearance. Action starring Bruce Lee, in Cantonese with subtitles. (1971)(96 mins).

programme.desc: Christopher Nolan's awe-inspiring sci-fi epic stars Matthew McConaughey and Anne Hathaway as explorers tasked with securing humanity's survival. (2014)(165 mins).

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Alcoholic superhero Will Smith hires a PR officer to help improve his image. With Charlize Theron. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2008)(98 mins).

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A ragtag team of supervillains are strong-armed into doing good by government agent Viola Davis. Superhero romp with Will Smith and Margot Robbie. (2016)(118 mins).

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio is a master of sub-conscious espionage in Christopher Nolan's blockbuster. Sci-fi thriller. Violence/flashing images. (2010)(142 mins).

programme.title: Snack Shack
programme.desc: Coming-of-age comedy drama starring Conor Sherry and Gabriel LaBelle. In 1990s Nebraska, best friends AJ and Moose need to find summer jobs. When they get the chance to take over the dilapidated refreshment stand at their local swimming pool, the pair throw themselves into their new venture - much to the horror of their parents and delight of their friends. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Decades later, Winton's records of the mission reawaken painful memories of the youngsters he couldn't save - and set him on an unexpected path to laying his ghosts to rest James Hawes - Director Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor.

programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: England's three-Test tour of Pakistan begins with day one in Multan against Shan Masood's men, as Brendon McCullum's red-ball outfit set out to replicate 2022's 3-0 whitewash. (07.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day two of the opening Test between Pakistan and England in Multan. Centuries from Shan Masood and Abdullah Shafique see Pakistan resume play on 328 for four. (08.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the first Test in Multan. England's new leading run-scorer in Test cricket Joe Root returns to the crease as the tourists close in on Pakistan's total of 556 all out. (10.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: An 86-over record partnership of 454 between England's Joe Root and Harry Brook has the tourists on the brink of a memorable win, as Pakistan trail by 115 runs on day five. (11.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day one of the second Test between Pakistan and England in Multan. The opener saw the tourists defeat the hosts in extraordinary fashion, winning by an innings and 47 runs. (15.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Pakistan resume day two of the second Test in Multan on 259 for five. In place of Babar Azam, debutant Kamran Ghulam hit a century before being removed by England's Shoaib Bashir. (16.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of the second Test between Pakistan and England. A pivotal final session yesterday saw momentum shift the way of the hosts, as England resume play on 239 for six. (17.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts

programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/96. With a huge trip to Newcastle looming, United looked to keep the pressure on at the top by beating struggling Bolton.

programme.title: PL: United v Nottm Forest 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 28/4/96. United ended their home campaign against Nottingham Forest, knowing that a win would take them to the brink of the Premiership title.

programme.title: PL: United v Sunderland 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/96. United took on Sunderland for the first time in the Premier League on what was to be a memorable afternoon at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: Nottm Forest v United 98/99
programme.desc: United Archives 6/2/99. Former United boss Ron Atkinson was hoping to get one over his old club when they visited the City Ground with Forest deep in relegation trouble.

programme.title: PL: United v Bradford 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 5/9/00. United battered the Bantams in impressive style with Teddy Sheringham and Quinton Fortune hitting a brace each.

programme.title: PL: United v Southampton 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/00. United welcomed struggling Southampton looking to keep up their scintillating home form, having scored 22 goals in their opening six league contests at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/01. United welcomed Arsenal knowing that victory would move them closer to securing a third consecutive Premiership crown.

programme.title: PL: United v Blackburn 10/11

programme.title: ICC Women's T20 WC: PAK v NZ Hlts
programme.desc: With both teams still mathematically in contention, it's New Zealand who know victory over opponents Pakistan clinches a semi-final berth at the 2024 ICC Women's T20 World Cup. (14.10).

programme.title: ICC Women's T20 WC: ENG v WI Hlts
programme.desc: England play out their final group-stage match at the 2024 ICC Women's T20 World Cup against the West Indies. A win guarantees Heather Knight's side a spot in the semi-finals. (15.10).

programme.title: Super League Grand Final Hlts
programme.desc: Hull KR make their maiden Grand Final appearance as the Robins take on the current Betfred Super League champions Wigan Warriors, who make a second successive Old Trafford outing. (12.10).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the inaugural Black Desert Championship. This competition marked southern Utah's PGA Tour return after 60 years away, with the last event taking place in 1963.

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Highlights
programme.desc: The PGA Tour Champions season rolls on with the SAS Championship, held at Prestonwood Country Club. Three-time Australian PGA Tour winner Rod Pampling won this event last season.

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion. (04.05).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP Highlights 2016
programme.desc: The United States Grand Prix from the Circuit of the Americas in Austin, Texas. Lewis Hamilton will be looking to revive his title challenge, and starts on pole ahead of rival Nico Rosberg.

programme.title: W/SLge
programme.desc: The 2024 season of the Betfred Women's Super League reaches its finale with the Grand Final at the Totally Wicked Stadium, as St Helens clash with reigning champions York Valkyrie. (06.10).

programme.title: NFL: Lions @ Cowboys Hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from an NFL match-up during week six of the 2024 regular season, as the Detroit Lions return to action after a bye week with a visit to the Dallas Cowboys. (13.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP Highlights 2022
programme.desc: At the Circuit of the Americas, how long can Carlos Sainz keep Max Verstappen at bay? The two line up on the front row with the Mercedes duo behind at the United States Grand Prix. (23.10).

programme.title: LIVE: Reyes Cup Pool D3
programme.desc: Day three of the inaugural Reyes Cup, as Team Asia and Team Europe compete at Ninoy Aquino National Stadium in Manila, Philippines. (17.10).

programme.title: Beterviev v Bivol PPV Highlights
programme.desc: Fabio Wardley and Frazer Clarke meet again on a blockbuster bill headlined by Artur Beterbiev's clash with Dmitry Bivol, including an in-ring return for Chris Eubank Jr. (12.10).

programme.title: Super League Grand Final Hlts
programme.desc: Hull KR make their maiden Grand Final appearance as the Robins take on the current Betfred Super League champions Wigan Warriors, who make a second successive Old Trafford outing. (12.10).

programme.title: Reyes Cup Pool D3
programme.desc: Day three of the inaugural Reyes Cup, as Team Asia and Team Europe compete at Ninoy Aquino National Stadium in Manila, Philippines. (17.10).

programme.desc: Hull KR make their maiden Grand Final appearance as the Robins take on the current Betfred Super League champions Wigan Warriors, who make a second successive Old Trafford outing. (12.10).

programme.title: My Icon: Sophie Cook
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, Sophie Cook - the first transgender woman to work in the Premier League - discusses the individuals that have inspired her during her life.

programme.title: Players Championship 2016 Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2016 Players Championship from the Stadium Course at TPC Sawgrass in Florida. American Rickie Fowler came into the tournament as defending champion from 2015.

programme.title: Live NFL: Lions @ Vikings
programme.sub-title: Season 2024 Live: Detroit Lions @ Minnesota Vikings NFL
programme.desc: Detroit (4-1), which is 4-1 in the past five encounters vs. the Vikings, won both meetings last season, including a 30-20 triumph at home in Week 18, as Jared Goff threw for 320 yards and two TDs; Minnesota (5-0) is allowing just 15.2 ppg in 2024.

programme.title: Live NFL: Chiefs @ 49ers
programme.sub-title: Season 2024 Live: Kansas City Chiefs @ San Francisco 49ers NFL
programme.desc: Kansas City (5-0) has won six of the past seven meetings with San Francisco (3-3), including a 25-22 triumph in Super Bowl LVIII on Feb. 11, as Mecole Hardman caught a 3-yard TD pass from Patrick Mahomes with just three seconds remaining in overtime.
